title: help pls
body:
when im trying to save my highlight from league it doesnt have image but have sound.
can someone help me?

replies.body: We've had some issues in the past with certain overlays or other software like OBS messing up replays if they were running during the game. Do me a favor and try disabling any extra stuff like Discord/OBS/Gameshow/Curse and test it out in a custom game, then load that replay to see if it recorded normally.
